title: The Biggest Mistakes People Make With IRA Rollovers
sub_head: As the number of rollovers increases, so does the number of mistakes. And they can cost savers a lot of money.
body:
With Covid-triggered changes in the economy and more people taking early retirement or changing jobs, there has been a surge in rollovers from 401(k)s to individual retirement accounts.
And mistakes that are commonly made withÂ such transfers of money are rising, too.
